Sentencas: Crack formation at the interface between sealing glass and other cell components is one of the key issues in constraining the development of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A robust glass-ceramic sealing material for solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of Ba3Nb10O28 phase

Sentencas: Herein, we report our finding on tuning the mechanical and thermal properties of borosilicate glass by doping Nb2O5.
Titulo: A robust glass-ceramic sealing material for solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of Ba3Nb10O28 phase

Sentencas: We observe the formation of Ba3Nb10O28 crystalline phase in the Nb2O5-doped glass, leading to significantly enhanced crack-resistant and self-healing abilities of the glass.
Titulo: A robust glass-ceramic sealing material for solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of Ba3Nb10O28 phase

Sentencas: In addition, we demonstrate long-term thermal and chemical stability at the sealing interface between the Nb2O5-doped glass-ceramics and Y2O3-ZrO2 electrolyte after heat-treatment at 700 degrees C for 1000 h. The possible mechanism for the improved crack-resistant and self-healing properties is discussed.
Titulo: A robust glass-ceramic sealing material for solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of Ba3Nb10O28 phase
